name: Zen Garden (itch)
description:
Input:

  • Left Mouse: Place object
  • Numbers 1-9: Select corresponding object
  • Mouse Scroll: Rotate objects before placing them
  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Position camera around platform in map editor mode. Movement in first-person mode.
  • R: Toggle Auto-rotating platform
  • T: Swap between first-person and map editor modes
